info.description:
This KanuFile downloads and creates a virtual machine of the
official openSUSE-Leap-15.6-Minimal-VM image

info.summary: Create VM from openSUSE Tumbleweed Minimal and install KDE
info.description:
This KankuFile creates a VM, installs KDE and configures the
display-manager.

**Enjoy YLWK**

info.summary: Create VM from openSUSE Tumbleweed Minimal
info.description:
This KankuFile creates a VM base on openSUSE-Tumbleweed-Minimal-VM.x86_64-kvm-and-xen
**Enjoy YLWK**
